tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE machine_performance_data (
    machine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    cpu_usage DECIMAL,
    memory_usage DECIMAL,
    disk_usage DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE AnomalyDetection (
    anomaly_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id INT,
    anomaly_type VARCHAR,
    anomaly_description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE machine_data (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    cpu_usage DECIMAL,
    memory_usage DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE anomaly_data (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    anomaly_type VARCHAR(50),
    severity INT
);

CREATE TABLE anomaly_log (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id UUID,
    anomaly_id UUID,
    description TEXT,
    resolved BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE machines_data (
    machine_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_name VARCHAR,
    cpu_usage DECIMAL,
    memory_usage DECIMAL,
    disk_usage DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE usage_stats (
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    machine_id UUID,
    cpu_usage DECIMAL,
    memory_usage DECIMAL,
    disk_usage DECIMAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (timestamp, machine_id)
);

CREATE TABLE anomalies_detected (
    anomaly_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    machine_id UUID,
    anomaly_type VARCHAR,
    anomaly_description TEXT
);
